attributes.action: We would like to have the choking game educated to all who work with children.
attributes.additional_details: My son passed away from the choking game also numerous other children in the UK have passed. Each parent including myself had never heard of it nor local authorities that have dealt with our child's death.
attributes.background: The choking game is taking our children's lives. Education to all who works with children needs addressing. Adults don't know what it is or the signs this needs changing and education is the key and possible prevention.
